title: Develop Network Infrastructure Terraform Module
description: Create VNet, Subnets, NSGs, and Route Tables to support AKS CNI networking and secure database access.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Authentication Core
acceptance_criteria: VNet created with non-overlapping CIDR blocks; Subnets segregated; NSG rules applied
definition_of_done: Terraform plan applies without errors; Networking reachable

title: Deploy PostgreSQL Flexible Server with PostGIS
description: Terraform module for Postgres Flexible Server, Read Replicas, and PostGIS extension activation.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Authentication Core
acceptance_criteria: PostgreSQL 15+ running; PostGIS extension verified; Read replica configured
definition_of_done: Connection verified via private endpoint; Extension query returns version

title: Configure Passport JWT Strategy for Azure AD B2C
description: Implement NestJS Passport strategy to validate JWT signature, issuer, and audience from Azure AD B2C OIDC metadata.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Authentication Core
acceptance_criteria: Valid B2C tokens decoded; Expired tokens throw 401; Keys fetched from JWKS
definition_of_done: Unit tests mocking JWT payload passing; Integration with B2C tenant working

title: Setup WatermelonDB Schema and Models
description: Define local database schema mirroring backend entities (ServiceRequest, Product) and configure WatermelonDB in React Native.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Foundation & Authentication Core
acceptance_criteria: Database initializes; Schema matches backend; CRUD works locally
definition_of_done: Schema migration scripts created; Unit tests for models passing

title: Configure AKS Cluster and Node Pools via Terraform
description: Provision AKS managed cluster with system and user node pools, enabling cluster autoscaler and Azure Monitor.
acceptance_criteria: AKS Cluster provisioned; RBAC enabled; Autoscaler active
definition_of_done: kubectl get nodes returns healthy; Autoscaler functional

title: Design and Implement Service Area Entity
description: Create TypeORM entity with PostGIS 'geometry' column for storing Service Center polygons.
acceptance_criteria: Entity supports Polygon; Spatial index created; Validation implemented

title: Implement Synchronization Logic (Pull/Push)
description: Develop the sync engine to pull changes from backend and push local changes using WatermelonDB's sync protocol.
acceptance_criteria: Pull/Push sync works; Reconnect syncs; Conflict resolution applied
definition_of_done: E2E sync simulation passed; Conflict scenarios handled

title: Implement Point-in-Polygon Routing Service
description: Write service logic to query PostGIS using ST_Intersects/ST_Contains to find Service Centers covering a user lat/long.
acceptance_criteria: Returns correct Service Center for point; Performance < 100ms
definition_of_done: Integration tests with seed data passing; Query plan optimized

title: Configure Native Background Location Permissions
description: Setup Info.plist (iOS) and AndroidManifest.xml for background location, requesting 'Always' and 'Motion' permissions.
acceptance_criteria: Permissions prompted correctly on both OS; Background modes enabled
definition_of_done: Verified on physical iOS and Android devices

title: Setup NestJS Gateway with Redis Adapter
description: Configure WebSocket gateway, enable Redis IoAdapter for horizontal scaling, and implement connection authentication.
acceptance_criteria: Handles ws:// connections; Redis propogates events; Auth handshake works
definition_of_done: Load test with 10k connections; Redis monitor verification

title: Develop Signature Capture Component
description: Implement a signature capture pad in React Native that saves to an image blob.
acceptance_criteria: Captures user input; Exports to PNG; Resets on clear
definition_of_done: Component reusable; Tested on low-end device

title: Develop Interactive Map Component for Service Areas
description: Implement Mapbox GL JS component for Admin portal to draw/edit service area polygons.
acceptance_criteria: Draw polygons; Edit vertices; Export GeoJSON
definition_of_done: Component integrated in Admin Portal; Accessibility checks passed
